extendedInfo.description: âª Listen to Latest Telugu Songs 24x7 live Telugu Radio Stations for FREE. âª30+ Radio stations to switch between and listen live from your android powered smart phones and tablets.Create your own list of favorite radio & add new external radio stations(Long Press on Radio Names for more options).Light-weighted User Interface for better results and lesser storage issues.âªâ¬ Included radio stations: â¬âªâ Manasu Thoâ Radio 9 Teluguâ Telugukokila Fmâ Tori Live (MQ)â Tori Ilayaraja ERAâ Tori AR Rehman ERAâ Tori All Time Hitsâ and many more ...(Request new stations, by sending us a e-mail!)â·â¶ Features: âââ Cool & Easy User Interface.â Light weighted Applicationâ Notifications for easy access to Radio.â Multitasking.â Sleep Timerâ Exit Button.â Send to Back Button, to run Radio in background mode.â My List, to manage your favourite radio stations.â Add Custom Radio Stations.â Display song title and artist.â Music stops on incoming call or incoming message.â Works with every version of Android starting from 1.0Radio Station List:Gelupu Radio, Gulf Andhra Radio, Manasu Tho, Radio 9 Telugu, Radio Suvartha, Radio Telugu, Telugukokila Fm, Teluguvani Radio, Tori Live, Hyderabad Techies Radio, Quran In TeluguPermissions explained:READ_PHONE_STATE: Is only used to stop the playback if you get a call. (for more details, see http://bit.ly/RzJkvu and http://bit.ly/Uldxyu)ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Is used to determine if you have Internet or if you are on e.g roaming.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: Is used to determine if you have WiFi or not and to prevent that WiFi accidently shuts off. Note: Telugu Radio uses internet data for streaming internet radios, so carrier data charges may apply(for GPRS, 3G). For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted WiFi networks when available. Please note, this app is ad supported.################# Please ignore below tags & keywords #############Tags : Free, Online, live, Radio, Telugu, FM, Tollywood, music, songs, song, oldies, remix, latest, hit, movie, album, telugu radio, telugu songs, telugu song, telugu music, hit song, hit songs, hit music, latest song, latest songs, latest music, latest telugu songs, latest telugu music, hit music, hit telugu songs, hit telugu music, latest hit song, latest hit songs, latest hit music, latest hit telugu song, latest hit telugu songs, latest hit telugu music, superhit, superhit songs, superhit music, new, dj, fm, 80's, 90's, 2013, playlist, mp3, top, best, popular, channel, station, internet
